# Decision Tree
Load the data
```{r}
train <- read.csv("data/train_rose.csv")
test <- read.csv("data/test.csv")
```

```{r}
# Create a decision tree model
library(rpart)
library(rpart.plot)
tree <- rpart(CARAVAN ~ ., data = train)
rpart.plot(tree)
```

```{r}
# Predict the test data
x_test <- test[names(test) != "CARAVAN"]
pred <- predict(tree, x_test)
pred <- as.numeric(pred > 0.5)
```

```{r}
# Create a confusion matrix
library(caret)
confusionMatrix(factor(pred), factor(test$CARAVAN), positive = "1")
```
